snippet: Schleper, a longtime U.S. ski team member, is set to compete in the giant slalom of the Alpine world ski championships and hopes to establish a training base in Colorado for the Mexican team.
abstract: Sarah Schleper, retired former champion of the United States ski team, will return to elite racing as a member of the Mexican national team; will compete on Mexico's behalf in the giant slalom event of the Alpine world ski championships; hopes to encourage other Mexicans to take up skiing, and to establish a training base for the team in Colorado.
lead_paragraph: Schleper, a longtime U.S. ski team member, is set to compete in the giant slalom of the Alpine world ski championships and hopes to establish a training base in Colorado for the Mexican team.

headline.main: Sarah Schleper, Now Representing Mexico, Is Poised for a Second Run
